values.description: This page explains how to build, train, deploy and store XGBoost models.
values.keywords: Import the XGBoost library, train the xgboost model, gradient boost tree regression prediction model, periodically re-train the model, use the label prediction to place orders, save xgboost models into the Object Store, load and trade with pre-trained xgboost models
